comment: 将 replaceAll 中的老奶奶的相关词条全部手动处理，避免后期文本出问题

some grandmas will be named after Patreo.english: some grandmas will be named after Patreon supporters
some grandmas will be named after Patreo.chinese: 一些老奶奶会以 Patreon 资助者的名字命名

This sugar lump was affected by the elde.english: This sugar lump was affected by the elders and grew to be meaty; harvesting it will yield between 0 and 2 lumps.
This sugar lump was affected by the elde.chinese: 受到老奶奶的影响，这个糖块长成了肥硕糖块；收获它将获得 0 到 2 个糖块。

[Grandma quote]A nice grandma to bake mo.english: A nice grandma to bake more cookies.
[Grandma quote]A nice grandma to bake mo.chinese: 善良的老奶奶可以烘焙出很多饼干。

Grandmas gain <b>+%1% CpS</b> for each n.english: Grandmas gain +%1% CpS for each non-grandma building.
Grandmas gain <b>+%1% CpS</b> for each n.chinese: 每拥有一个非老奶奶建筑，老奶奶生产的饼干 +%1% CpS。

Grandma-operated science lab and leisure.english:
Grandma-operated science lab and leisure club.
Grandmas are 4 times as efficient.
Regularly unlocks new upgrades.
Grandma-operated science lab and leisure.chinese:
老奶奶运营的科学实验室和休闲会所。
老奶奶的生产效率提升至原来的四倍。
定期解锁新升级。

Puts a permanent end to the elders' wrat.english: Puts a permanent end to the elders' wrath, at the cost of %1% of your CpS.
Puts a permanent end to the elders' wrat.chinese: 消耗 %1% 的 CpS，永久平息老奶奶的愤怒。

You will get %1% of your CpS back, but t.english: You will get %1% of your CpS back, but the grandmatriarchs will return.
You will get %1% of your CpS back, but t.chinese: 虽然你可以拿回 %1% 的 CpS，但老奶奶元老会回来。

You haven't pledged to the elders yet..english: You haven't pledged to the elders yet.
You haven't pledged to the elders yet..chinese: 你尚未与老奶奶订立誓约。

Elder pledges last <b>twice</b> as long..chinese: 老奶奶誓约持续时间翻倍。

Each grandma (up to %1) makes sugar lump.english: Each grandma (up to %1) makes sugar lumps ripen %2 sooner.
Each grandma (up to %1) makes sugar lump.chinese: 每个老奶奶（最多 %1 个）可使糖块成熟速度加快 %2。

Appease the grandmatriarchs at least <b>.chinese: 至少安抚一次老奶奶元老。

Appease the grandmatriarchs at least <b>.english: Appease the grandmatriarchs at least %1 times.
Appease the grandmatriarchs at least <b>.chinese: 至少安抚 %1 次老奶奶元老。

Declare a covenant with the grandmatriar.english: Declare a covenant with the grandmatriarchs.
Declare a covenant with the grandmatriar.chinese: 与老奶奶元老立定盟约。

Own at least <b>%1</b> grandma types..chinese: 至少拥有 %1 种老奶奶。

Pop a reindeer <b>during an elder frenzy.english: Pop a reindeer during an elder frenzy.
Pop a reindeer <b>during an elder frenzy.chinese: 在老奶奶狂热期间击破一头驯鹿。

[Achievement name 327]Grandma needs a ne.english: Grandma needs a new pair of shoes
